channel.title: Work on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Work on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer

item.title: Time to start the next adventure
item.description: Exciting! Finally I am ready to take the next step. I’ve sorted out the things I needed and started a business that allows me to begin my freelance work. The time has come to find my first assignment and with that, start my first adventure as digital nomad.

item.title: Trading a well-paid job for ultimate freedom
item.description: Sometimes you have to make a decision in your life that goes against everything you ever learned. Recently I made such a decision by quitting my job and buying a ticket to the other side of the world. And now the adventure begins…
